title: Did the Director of the Environmental Protection Agency of Obama say that a clean energy plan would have no "impact" on carbon emissions?
subtitle: The former American Rick Santorum attributed the claim to former EPA president Jenna McCarthy when a guest appeared on "The Real Time with Bill Maher."
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Director of the former Environmental Protection Agency (Jenna McCarthy) said that the Obama Clean Energy Management Plan would have little or no impact on CO2 emissions.
